tool_description: Analyzes competing comedians' performance schedules, material styles, and audience overlap to identify market opportunities and differentiation strategies.

target_market.description: Geographic market or venue cluster to analyze

analysis_radius_miles.description: Radius in miles for competitor search

comedian_experience_level.description: Experience level to compare against (beginner, intermediate, advanced)

date_range_months.description: Months of historical data to analyze (1-12)

error_messages: Invalid target market: The specified market was not found in the database.
Invalid radius: analysis_radius_miles must be between 5 and 100.
Invalid experience level: Must be one of 'beginner', 'intermediate', or 'advanced'.
Invalid date range: date_range_months must be between 1 and 12.
Insufficient competitor data: Not enough competitor information available for meaningful analysis.
usage: Specify target_market to analyze local competition. Adjust radius, experience level, and date range to refine the competitive landscape analysis.

popular_venues.description: Most frequently booked venues by competitors

common_material_themes.description: Most popular material themes among competitors

differentiation_opportunities.description: Identified gaps in competitor material and scheduling
